category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: The Male Sleuth, Type-1-2 emoji is a sequence of the ?? Sleuth or Spy, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-1-2, ? Male Sign and ? Variation S http://emojipedia.org/male-sleuth-type-1-2/
name: man detective: light skin tone
note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of the man detective emoji for light skin tones features a sharp, inquisitive gaze and a classic trench coat, all brought to life with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and precise lighting. The details, like the subtle texture of his hat and the confident tilt of his head, are rendered with exceptional clarity on Apple devices, evoking a sense of mystery, investigation, and keen observation. This emoji is perfect for communicating a feeling of uncovering secrets, solving problems, or embarking on a search.
